title: 300+ Stylised Icons Pack
description: Pack of 332 flat icons (+ armor, menu buttons, bottles icons without background) and one empty background.  Will work great with mobile type of games as well as game for PC.
longDescription:
What's inside:


ARMOR:

- 14 heavy armor icons,

- 12 light armor icons,

- 13 medium armor icons.

All armor icons have version without background.


ABILITIES WEAPONS:

- 11 archry skills icons,

- 10 axe skills icons,

- 10 daggers skills icons,

- 10 hammer skills icons,

- 9 shield skills icons,

- 12 sword skills icons.


VARIOUS ICONS:

- 77 icons suitable for inventory and statuses,

- 96 basic buttons which includes controllers buttons (such as mouse, keyboard, consoles pad) and versions without background,

- 10 various cursors (without background),

- 10 types of loading circle (without background),

- 4 sliders icons (without background),

- 12 activity icons witch arrows (such as pick/grab/loot etc.).

- 22 bottles/potions icons and versions without background.


!! IMPORTANT !!

If you’re using engine version older than 5.0 and can’t see icons properly in the Content Drawer; try these solutions:

  1. Change the compression settings to “Displacementmap (8/16bit)".
  2. Edit the icons and set the compression to User Interface and the Quality to UI.

There is no issue in Version 5.0 and higher.



If you have any questions feel free to ask:

katgrabowska.mail@gmail.com


Thank you and enjoy!
technicalDetails:
Number of Textures:

  • 332 icons with background (+ 1 empty background)
  • 157 icons without background (armor icons, menu buttons, bottles icons)

Texture Resolutions: 512 x 512 px
